before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"b5vp3","text":"Have the following solutions premixed:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2g5g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9hpg","text":"Glucose 20% 500 ml solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgr7m","text":"Concentration: 200 g/l","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fts37","text":"mix 100 g Glucose in 500 ml deionized water (ddH2O)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":48,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au9vi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a787","text":"Adenine 100x 100 ml solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rrvs","text":"Concentration 3 g/l","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uccc","text":"mix 0.3 g Adenine in 100 ml ddH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":31,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ogo3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr6q4","text":"Methionine 200x 50 ml:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tgu7","text":"Concentration: 17.12 g/l","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49lie","text":"mix 856 mg into 50 ml ddH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3bfdb","text":"This protocol describes the steps to prepare imaging medium for Saccharomyces cerevisiae with adjusted refractive index. This medium is optimized for fluorescence imaging by the reduction of auto-fluorescence through an abundance of Adenine [1] and the repression of of the Met-promoted pp7- CP expression [2].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
